prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://slotzy.org/ that feel at home on worldcasinodirectory.com.

Reference SERP keyword: casino
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): Slotzy.org

Anchor operates in: Sweden. 

I need to have the country in the title.

Reference titles:
- World Casino Directory - Casino Guide and Gambling ...
- United States Casinos & Gambling
- World's newest casinos in 2025, grand opening ...
- Silver Creek Casino at Hilton Garden Inn Missoula
- Elk Creek Kiowa Casino - Hobart
- Elwha River Casino
- Which Casino Games Are the Easiest to Win? A Guide ...
- Magic Diamond Casino at Red Lion Hotel
- World Casino News
- Macau Casino - Lakewood
- Montana Lil's Casino Grand Ave
- Casino Openings - World Casino News
- Slots
- Casino Caribbean - Kirkland
- Definitions of slot machine related terminology & lingo
- Jackpot Nevada Casino
- U.S.A.
- Casino Project Updates
- Jackpot Casino Bozeman
- Oregon Casinos & Gambling in Oregon
- Caesars Launches Horseshoe Online Casino for ...
- Silver Dollar Casino Seatac
- Par-A-Dice Hotel Casino
- Crazy Moose Casino Pasco
- FanDuel Casino Partners with Lady Luck HQ to Expand ...

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of worldcasinodirectory.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to worldcasinodirectory.com while naturally justifying a link to https://slotzy.org/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude Slotzy.org and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Sweden where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').
But in this case please use the anchors terms, try to use them naturally.

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
